summary: Federal agencies award research and development funds to small businesses through small business research programs. But foreign governments may try to steal their research, which can pose risks to the U.S. Agencies have taken steps to do their due diligence when awarding funds, such as getting more tools to vet business applicants. But some agencies don't have a written process on how to request more...
title: Small Business Research Programs: Agencies Identified Foreign Risks, but Some Due Diligence Programs Lack Clear Procedures
